title: Can you review my (ranked) games and give me advice

embed.description: League of Legends (LoL) Summoner Search, Stats, Replay, Spectating, Current Game, Ranking, Match History

body:
I clearly have lots to improve on, but if you could just make a bullet-point list of everything I need to improve on and in what order that would be great. If you need to spectate a game, just I.M. me or something. Don't be afraid to be harsh, I'm in bronze 5, I get flamed constantly anyways. I just want to be better than a monkey with a mouse tbh.
also recommend champions and lanes based on what you see, so i have someone (and somewhere) to work with and learn/improve upon.
